summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 NISSAN MURANO. THE CONTACT STATED WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 70 MPH THE SUNROOF EXPLODED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A DEALER WHERE THE MECHANIC DIAGNOSED THAT THE SUNROOF NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE PROBLEM. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 23,700.
